titles.title: End Zuckerbucks Act of 2023
End Zuckerbucks Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit section 501(c)(3) organizations from providing funding for the administration of elections for public office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
End Zuckerbucks Act of 2023
This bill prohibits tax-exempt charitable organizations from providing direct funding to states or local governments for the administration of elections for public office.
